thread.title: New West Oakland kitchen to prepare fresh meals for district
thread.title_full: New West Oakland kitchen to prepare fresh meals for district - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jill Tucker
title: New West Oakland kitchen to prepare fresh meals for district
text:
Photo: Leah Millis, The Chronicle Ryan Woods, 8, left, and Andre Tule-De La Cruz, 6, both reach for the last mac and cheese during lunchtime at Lafayette Elementary School in Oakland. Ryan Woods, 8, left, and Andre Tule-De La Cruz, 6, both reach for...
The elementary school students who lined up for lunch Friday peered down at their two entree choices — macaroni and cheese or a barbecue chicken sandwich — but found it hard to tell the difference. Both were in identical paper trays covered in plastic, condensation concealing the food inside. Ryan Woods, 8, left, and Andre Tule-De La Cruz, 6, both reach for the last mac and cheese during lunchtime at Lafayette Elementary School in Oakland. The elementary school students who lined up for lunch Friday peered down at their two entree choices — macaroni and cheese or a barbecue chicken sandwich — but found it hard to tell the difference. Both were in identical paper trays covered in plastic, condensation concealing the food inside.
